scripts.build: cp extension/settings/prod.js extension/settings.js; npm run update-localization; web-ext build -s extension --overwrite-dest  --no-config-discovery -n firefox_translations.xpi
scripts.once: cp extension/settings/dev.js extension/settings.js; npm run update-localization; web-ext run -s extension --verbose --firefox nightly  --no-config-discovery --pref=extensions.experiments.enabled=true --pref=extensions.translations.disabled=false --pref=javascript.options.wasm_simd_wormhole=true
scripts.package: npm run build && mv web-ext-artifacts/*.zip addon.xpi
scripts.update-localization: git submodule init && git submodule update --remote --depth 1 extension/_locales; npm run clean-localization-folder
